title: Rare downtown Cleveland townhome!
posting_body: Your opportunity to have a rare downtown Cleveland townhome that allows you to be in walking distance from all of the City's best amenities from Playhouse Square to Lake Erie sunsets to Cleveland State University to Cleveland Browns/Cavs/Guardians stadiums!
The interior exceeds expectations with hardwood floors throughout, extra large windows and an open floor plan perfect for entertaining.
Through the threshold, find a bright and airy living space on the ground level and head upstairs to the main living level.
The gourmet and sleek kitchen is features white cabinetry, granite countertops, full package of stainless steel appliances and center island.
Opening to the dining and living space which features beautiful crown molding and decorative stone gas fireplace.
Upstairs find the bedroom quarters where each bedroom has full gorgeous bathroom.
What more can one ask for?
